topics.body:
I just wrote a small short (by small, I mean 2,000 words) based on a story I made.

>climax of fight in coliseum
>everyone at hospital
>visiting hours
>female patient/fighter sleeping due to painkillers
>rival appears in room
>gives flowers and kiss on forehead
>leaves
>next day, patient/fighter awake with friends
>hold bouquet of flowers
>don't know who's from
>can guess and cries while smiling
